name: Junxue Zhang 0001
content: Junxue Zhang Junxue ZHANG is currently a Professor (ç‰¹ä»»æ•™æˆ) at the School of Computer Science and Technology, University of Science and Technology of China (USTC). Before that, he was a Research Assistant Professor at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). Junxue obtained his Ph.D. at iSINGLab, HKUST, supervised by Prof. Kai CHEN. His research interests are building high-performance, intelligent and secure datacenter networking, with a particular focus on Networked System for LLM now. Please see his research statement for more information.
